extendedInfo.description: Individual Basketball Stats allows you to track stats for a single player for an entire season (Full version: Team Basketball Stats). Stats can then be exported in an email with an attached Excel file ready to be viewed. See "Team Basketball Stats" for multiple player support, removal of ads, and automatic score additions for your team.-Follow us on Twitter @Arrowsharkprods and when we reach 100 followers, Team Basketball Stats will go FREE for a limited time.-Stats can be viewed per game or as a season total.-Track 2 pt field goals made and attempted, 3 pt field goals made and attempted, free throws made and attempted, offensive rebounds, defensive rebounds, blocks, steals, assists, turnovers, personal fouls, and charges. Along with these are 4 customizable buttons which can be changed at will. -See the instructional video at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p0YAPnERyAs for detailed instructions.-Visit our website at http://arrowsharkprods.weebly.com/-Follow us on Twitter @Arrowsharkprods-Like Arrowshark on Facebook!http://www.facebook.com/Arrowshark-Please report any force closed errors so that they may be fixed.

reviews.title: Simple and easy
reviews.comment: App is simple and easy to use.
reviews.author: Keshia Scott

reviews.title: Great For Tracking
reviews.comment: Wish that it would keep automatic scores. Also it should include the Charges with the Foul total counts. All in all it\'s a good app.
reviews.author: Terri Lamar

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: My son loves me using this app after every game I tell him his stats then email them. Great job.
reviews.author: Darren Hay

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Great tool to use with my daughter after games!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bball
reviews.comment: Great app easy to use too!  GOOD JOB
reviews.author: randall dinges
